https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oAit5WpzApbgtJ1nJ95rl30zAuR.jpg Pedro, a gay man with an active social life and big circle of friends, takes in his nephew Bernardo for a couple weeks. When it appears as though it might become a permanent arrangement, however, Pedro turns to his friends for guidance as he and 9-year-old Bernardo begin to forge a household together. Bear Cub
